author: mmerz
msg: Enable controls for WSM projects. *.jws source files can now use control annotations.
Note that this creates dependencies on the controls sub-project: wsm-axis now requires controls.jar.

author: ddewolf
msg: Throwing PortletException when a dispatcher for the portlet could not be retrieved. (Typically caused by misconfiguration and/or not being able to find the portlet-app's context).  Thanks to Brad Johnson for this bug fix!

author: ddewolf
msg: Updating the testsuite to use more recent versions of digester and beanutils.  This allows us to remove a dependency upon commons-collections (which happened to have never been defined here!).  Deployment on the most recent Tomcat 5.5 nightly allowed me to catch the missing dependency.
Also removing duplicated project info.  The pom extends the main pom so we don't need to redefine the items that are identical unless they are different.
